name: Juliette Lamarche
bio: Math graduate and poet turned cook turned front-end developer, with a focus on pragmatic functional programming and expressive code. Poetesse diplômée en mathématiques devenue cuisinière deveue développeuse front-end, avec un intérêt pour la programmation fonctionnelle pragmatique et le code expressif.
position: Frontend developer @ Banque Nationale du Canada
title: Leaving the Happy Path: All Those Things we Have Called an Error
description: Error handling is often a missing piece in application design. We will take a deep dive into different concepts that can hide behind the notion of error and their most common implementations. Concrete examples will be taken from Node, React and Tanstack Query.
